name: off-grid-effects
title: 方格外的特效
author: Earendel
description: 使爆炸,烟雾,颗粒和其他特效可以被其他mod中的lua脚本基于游戏网格进行放置.
description_original: A modding utility that sets the 'placeable-off-grid' flag for explosions, smoke, particles, and other effects so that they can be placed properly by other mods lua scripts.
